sections.heading: law; applicability.The rule of the common law that statutes in derogation thereof are to be strictly construed has no application to this code
sections.text: SourceR.S.1867, Code § 1, p. 394;R.S.1913, § 8567;C.S.1922, § 9518;C.S.1929, § 20-2219;R.S.1943, § 25-2218.Annotations1. Construction2. Miscellaneous1. Const
